name: Tomáš Pažourek
metaKeywords: Tomáš Pažourek, CV, personal page, programmer, programming, software engineer, developer
metaDescription: I am creative software engineer from Czech Republic, this is my CV.
title: Software Engineer
summary: I am creative software engineer from Czech Republic with extensive experience with development of applications for desktop, web and embedded devices. My current focus revolves mostly around web development, technologies surrounding .NET Framework, service science, and innovation in e-commerce.

skillGroups.title: Full-stack Web Development
items: WS API design using REST, SOAP and XML-RPC
Good knowledge of JavaScript and jQuery
SCSS, LESS, Jade, Bootstrap, Bower, Gulp
Web development in PHP (Model-View-Presenter pattern), knowledge of Nette Framework
Web development in ASP.NET (both plain ASP.NET and MVC)

skillGroups.title: .NET
items: Good knowledge of C# and VB.NET
SimpleInjector, Automapper, StructureMap, DevExpress WinForms Controls, Resco Toolkit, .NET Compact Framework, NUnit, NuGet, ReSharper

skillGroups.title: Databases
items: Experience with Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, Oracle RDBMS

skillGroups.title: Other
items: Experience with several projects for touch-based user interfaces
